SAFIRE Publications

The following publications are an outcome of SAFIRE project work.



Using Semantics for Speech Annotation of Images.
Chaitanya Desai, Dmitri V. Kalashnikov, Sharad Mehrotra, and Nalini Venkatasubramanian.
Proc. of IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering (IEEE ICDE), short publication, 2009.

The Software EBox: Information Integration for Situational Awareness
Naveen Ashish, Jay Lickfett, Sharad Mehrotra and Nalini Venkatasubramanian
IEEE Intelligence and Security Informatics (ISI), June 2009, Dallas

RADcast: Enabling Reliability Guarantees for Content Dissemination in Ad Hoc Networks
Bo Xing, Sharad Mehrotra and Nalini Venkatasubramanian
The 28th Conference on Computer Communications (IEEE INFOCOM 2009). April 19 - 25, 2009. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

Exploiting Semantics For Scheduling Data Collection From Sensors On Real-Time To Maximize Event Detection
R. Vaisenberg, S. Mehrotra and D. Ramanan
In Multimedia and Computer Networks (MMCN'09, San Jose, CA).

Exploiting Semantics for Sensor Recalibration in Event Detection Systems
R. Vaisenberg , S. Ji, B. Hore, S. Mehrotra and N. Venkatasubramanian
In Multimedia and Computer Networks (MMCN'08, San Jose, CA).

Practical Experiences in Enabling and Ensuring Quality Sensing
Chris Davison Daniel Massaguer Bo Xing, Qi Han Sharad Mehrotra Nalini Venkatasubramanian
ACM Middleware Workshop (In Progress)

Evaluation of SAFIRE Situational Awareness Technologies by Firefighter Incident Command Experts
Chris Davison Jay Lickfett Sharad Mehrotra Nalini Venkatasubramanian
UC, Irvine Technical Report (In Progress)

A framework for progressive localization query evaluation.
Stefano Bonetti
UC Irvine, Master's thesis, March 2009

Visualization of query results in multimedia databases
Chiara Chiappini
UC Irvine, Master's thesis, March 2009
